full_summary:
# ID: WS3764827989
===================================================================================================

**Government Tender Announcement**

**Contract Title:** Scanning Lidar B (Capteur Lidar à Balayage B)
=====================================================================================================

**Call Number:** WS3764827989

**Closing Date:** June 6, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
=====================================================================================================

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC) invites proposals for the provision of Scanning Lidar B (Capteur Lidar à Balayage B). This request for proposal (RFP) is open to all qualified suppliers.

**Scope of Work:**
The selected contractor will be required to provide Location and Navigation Systems and Components, Specialized Vehicle Systems and Components, Vehicle Testing and Measuring Equipment, and Scanners.

**Objective:**
The PSPC/SPAC seeks to identify a capable supplier that can provide the Scanning Lidar B (Capteur Lidar à Balayage B) to meet the needs of the National Research Council of Canada (NRC) / Conseil national de recherches du Canada (CNRC).

**Key Dates:**

* Closing Date: June 6, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Award Date: To be determined
* Contract Start Date: June 22, 2023
* Contract End Date: January 31, 2024

**Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria:**

* Suppliers must be registered in accordance with the trade agreements in effect at the time of submission.
* Evaluations will be based on the lowest price for each component.

**Contact Information:**

* Jessica Canas, PSPC/SPAC
* Phone: None
* Email: [jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Reference Number: WS3764827989

**Notice URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16306679?extsite=MTYzMDY2NzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16306679?extsite=MTYzMDY2NzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) =================================================================================================
